section.about: The Digital Maths Academy switches kids on to maths. It is engaging, supportive and targeted for Kids aged under 12. Students across Ireland and in further development will target kids worldwide, aligned for a huge variety of international curricula. We love to celebrate our greatest Mathletes! Will you or your school make it onto our leaderboard of top scorers? Complete your Quiz work and earn points for your daily total. Digital Maths Academy gives each student its very own peesonal workspace. Filleds quiz mathamatical quizzes to test you Math logic. Digital Maths Academy caters for the evolving learning styles.

section.special: Ask your parent or guardian for permission before you send any personal information over the Internet, including to our Web Sites. Digital Maths Academy has no intention of seeking personal information about minors who visit our Web Sites. If such information is collected, this Privacy Statement will apply to that information. In addition, if we can identify a user as a minor, the personal information will not be used for further marketing and promotion unless the minors guardian has consented. We encourage you to ask your children to seek your permission before providing information about themselves or their family over the Internet.

section.information: To send a confirmation notice to the Registrant of the registration. To respond to any questions, concerns or problems raised by the Registrant. To send out a Digital Maths Academy Learning newsletter or emails about the Site. To publish the names of winners and high performers on the Site or in the Digital Maths Academy newsletter and to provide all the results data for each Registrant. To send leaderboard results for participation and performance on the Site.

section.secure: Digital Maths Academy is committed to information security. We will use all reasonable endeavours to keep Registrants personal information in a secure environment. For instance, each Registrants personal information is encrypted whilst being sent to our server at the time of registration. However, security cannot be guaranteed due to the nature of the internet. Digital Maths Academy security measures are designed to assist in Registrants personal information not being accessed by unauthorised personnel, lost or misused. If you reasonably believe that there has been an unauthorised use or disclosure of your personal information please let us know by contacting our Privacy and Data Protection Officer (contact details below).

section.time: We will keep any personal information we collect from Registrants for as long as they are registered users of the Site. If a Registrant cancels their registration or it otherwise lapses after 3 years of not using the Site, we will only keep their personal information for the purposes of sending the Registrant information regarding Digital Maths Academys learning other products and services if they agree to receive this information. Personal information is otherwise deleted or destroyed.

section.cookies: A cookie is a little piece of information handed to a web browser from a web server that contains information that can be retrieved from the server later. When you visit the Site the server may attach a cookie to your computers memory. Digital Maths Academy uses cookies only to the limited extent to recognise the Registrant when they visit the Site and pairing that Registrant with the account (and account preferences) that the Registrant created. However, this information is not linked to any personal information that Registrant may provide and cannot be used to identify Registrants. You should be able to configure your computer so that it disables cookies. To help us better understand you needs and better share content, we also use analytical software. This software will save a cookie to your computers hard drive in order to track and monitor your engagement and usage of the website but will not store, save or collect personal information. You can read Google's privacy policy here for further information. Other cookies may be stored to your computers hard drive when this website uses referral programs, sponsored links or adverts which is extremely rare. Such cookies typically expire after 30 days, though some may take longer. No personal information is stored, saved or collected without your consent.
